接口 org.jsoup.Connection.Request
的使用

  • 使用Connection.Request的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.jsoup
    Contains the main Jsoup class, which provides convenient static access to the jsoup functionality.
    org.jsoup.helper  

    • org.jsoup中Connection.Request的使用

      返回Connection.Request的org.jsoup中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.data(Connection.KeyVal keyval)
      Add a data parameter to the request
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.followRedirects(boolean followRedirects)
      Configures the request to (not) follow server redirects.
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.ignoreContentType(boolean ignoreContentType)
      Configures the request to ignore the Content-Type of the response.
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.ignoreHttpErrors(boolean ignoreHttpErrors)
      Configures the request to ignore HTTP errors in the response.
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.maxBodySize(int bytes)
      Update the maximum body size, in bytes.
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.parser(Parser parser)
      Specify the parser to use when parsing the document.
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.postDataCharset(java.lang.String charset)
      Sets the post data character set for x-www-form-urlencoded post data
      Connection.Request Connection.request()
      Get the request object associated with this connection
      Connection.Request Connection.Request.timeout(int millis)
      Update the request timeout.
      参数类型为Connection.Request的org.jsoup中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Connection Connection.request(Connection.Request request)
      Set the connection's request
